forecast.day_comments: A 20 percent chance of snow showers between 3am and 5am.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 23. Southwest wind 5 to 8 mph.
forecast.night_comments: A 40 percent chance of snow showers, mainly after 1pm.  Mostly cloudy, with a high near 29. Calm wind becoming northwest around 5 mph in the afternoon.  New snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.

forecast.day_comments: A 50 percent chance of snow showers, mainly after noon.  Partly sunny, with a high near 30. Calm wind becoming west around 5 mph in the afternoon.  Total daytime snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: A 40 percent chance of snow showers, mainly before 10pm.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 16. Northwest wind 5 to 7 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph.  New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.
